attributes.action: up the benifits to people who need it an stop imogrants claiming as soon as they come to this country they should have to wait at least 6months before they can claim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think the prime minister should live off the money we have to each month an see how hard it is for us to support our famlies when we have no job and little money. i think he should also stop imogrants been able to get money as soon as they get into our country they should have to wait at least 6 months while they get investigated properly they should also be made to find work like we are an put on waiting lists for houses like we are gorden brown should put his countrys people before anyone else our needs are just as important

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
